simulation.math.hexagon

Class Hexagon

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.math.hexagon.Hexagon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hexagon

    public class Hexagon
extends java.lang.Object
    A hexagon representation, based on the page http://blog.rusland.com/2011/02/hexagonal-grid-math.html Here, we're working with a flat-top hexagon
    Author:
    Lucas SOARES
